content: finished round 8 finished round 15 lantern cont -adjust round 17 as needed to place the top of the poles directly above the bottom of them -i recommend stuffing before working round 17 for nikelle finished round 17 finished round 17 x embroider the xs embroider with lantern color or a contrasting color of your choice follow the numbers in the image numbers 1 and 3 are centered below the tops of the poles numbers 2 and 4 are centered above the bottoms of the poles embroider a line from 1-2 bring out of 3 and embroider 2nd line down to 4 bring out of 1 again and repeat the process on the other side bring tails out through the same st tie a knot and hide them inside f f r r o o n n t t b b a a c c k k 1 3 3 1 1 3 3 1 2 2 4 4 4 4 2 2 handmade by nikelle handle handle with the front
